title: Bless 'em all,
content:
the long\*

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115313im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/nomenca_4142.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081201115313im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/albar_6087.jpg)
  
It’s all in a week’s work;-)

author: Richard Hards
